title: Im in highschool and im having trouble focusing in class. whenever I try to focus these words just appear in my head and I just cant concentrate on what the teachers saying what do I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, I am sorry that your having a difficult time concentrating in class. I believe writing things down - taking the words you can see in your head and on to paper. Often when somethings keep appearing, it means it needs your attention. I find writing often helps sort out what thought we are having and find out what they mean - whether its something you need to address right now or later. Hopefully, it works for you
